summary: Completed frontend testing of menu restructuring: Service Reports rename, Project Reports with 6 categories, and Project Schedule page. All features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Layout.js line 110: 'Service Reports' correctly renamed from 'Customer Service' in sidebar navigation
ProjectReports.js: All 6 menu items correctly configured with proper hrefs
ProjectSchedule.js: Full Gantt chart component with Create Schedule button, stats cards, and localStorage persistence
App.js: Routes correctly added for /projects/project-reports/schedule and /projects/project-reports/work-completion
context_for_next_testing_agent: Menu restructuring complete. Service Reports visible in sidebar. Project Reports page has 6 categories. Project Schedule page uses localStorage for data storage.

sidebar_service_reports.details: Sidebar shows 'Service Reports' instead of 'Customer Service' under Projects Dept - verified in screenshots

details: Page loads correctly with title 'Project Reports'
Clicking Work Completion Certificates card navigates to correct page
Page shows work completion certificates list with stats (Total: 5, Draft: 3, Submitted: 0, Approved: 2)
4 stats cards present: Total Schedules, Draft, In Progress, Completed
Empty state shows 'No Schedules Found' with Create Schedule button
Back arrow navigates to Project Reports page

back_navigation.details: Back arrow on Project Schedule page correctly navigates back to Project Reports
